check.name: FinalClass
check.description:
Check that identifies classes that can be declared as final are explicitly made final. The following is the type of classes that can be identified:

  1. Private classes with implicit constructor.
  2. Classes with all the type of modifier which contains only private constructor.

Classes are skipped if:

  1. Class is already Final.
  2. Class is declared as abstract.
  3. Class is Super class of some Anonymous inner class.
  4. Class is with nested sub class.
